duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate with sales, marketing and our partner team to develop new strategies to build our sales pipeline and grow our business.
Balance the reactive work of responding to interested users with a creative and proactive approach to identify new opportunities.
Use Salesforce, Marketo, LinkedIn, and other prospecting tools to research accounts, identify key contacts and craft targeted messaging.
Learn our technology and effectively communicate our value proposition with a technical audience. Work to understand their goals and challenges to better understand how we can help.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field
